summary: Adds a new, upgradeable sword to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][u]
[/u][/size][center][size=4][u]Solvistapp[/u][/size]
By Billyro[/center]


[u]Description[/u]

This mod adds a new, upgradeable sword to Skyrim. Beginning as a broken iron sword, you can reforge it to a regular iron sword, then steel, silver and finally ebony-silver. 

[i][color=#fff2cc]You can find Solvistapp in a (sunken) chest at The Wreck of the Winter War, which is east of Windhelm. [/color][/i]



[center][b]Video in the spoiler tab![/b]
[spoiler][youtube]r74OPmoiT70[/youtube]
Thanks to Nozi87 for the video![/spoiler][/center][u]Main Files

[/u]2K Textures: Recommended for most users.

4K Textures: Recommended for users with powerful PCs. 


[u]Optional Files[/u]

DSR Patch: Makes the one-handed weapons compatible with Dual Sheath Redux. Made by OrixFrost. Requires a main file!


[u]Compatibility[/u]

This mod should be compatible with everything. If a mod alters the landscape shape beneath The Winter War, there may be a potential conflict, but I don't know of any mods that edit this place. 


[u]Installation[/u]

Copy the meshes and textures folder to your Skyrim\Data folder. Activate the .esp in the Skyrim launcher. That's it! Alternatively, you can download with NMM and activate it through that.


[u]Permissions[/u]

Please don't redistribute this mod. If you wish to use Solvistapp in a custom mod, please let me know beforehand.
